DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate impact supplementary food ( cooky ) prevent risk develop moderate acute malnutrition ( MAM ) preschool mildly malnourish child . Children divide two group ; one receive cookie plus 12 educative session educative program . The study last 12 month
DOC.brief_title: Supplementary Food Prevention Moderate Malnutrition Children
DOC.criteria: ( 25 year old ) , low socioeconomic class ( E D class ) reside rural area , WHZ > 3 ≤ 2 , inform consent give subject 's mother caregiver Severe acute malnutrition ( HAZ , WAZ WHZscores ≤3 ) base 2006 World Health Organization ( WHO ) reference value ( 24 ) Vitamin A deficiency ( soften , ulceration , cloudiness cornea , dryness conjunctivitis ) , iodine deficiency ( visible goiter ) ( 3 episode loose/liquid stools/per day last 24hours ) , fever ( high temperature last 24 hour report mother/caregiver ) , respiratory infection ( cough and/or runny nose last 24 hour ) . Current consumption supplementary food . Peanut ingredient allergy base prior report . If direct family member allergic peanut , child would enrol .
